Text: Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Thank you

Very cool! Thank you so much for this! I've actually been comparing my list of Rifftrax shorts against the list of them on Wikipedia, and I have 147 of them now with the ones from this torrent, but I still seem to still be missing "Unto The Least of These". I'll see if I have any other holes in my collection that I can see. In the meantime, does anyone have the riff of "Unto The Least of These"?

Okay, I checked my collection again, the Rifftrax shorts list on Wikipedia, and your other torrent's comments, and I figured out that I also need "What About Juvenile Delinquency?" I thought I already had a copy of it, but it turns out I was mistaken, as I was confusing the MST3K version of it for this one. Any chance of making another supplementary torrent with that one and "Unto The Least Of These"? :D
I hate to do this to ya, but it's missing The Case of Tommy Tucker part 2.  To help, I'm going to attempt posting it to the newsgroup.

I was able to get The Case of Tommy Tucker Part 2 from this torrent I found while looking around a couple days ago. http://www.torrents.net/torrent/1732037/RiffTrax---Shorts/ If anyone knows where I could find "Unto The Least of These" and the juvenile delinquency one, please let me know. Thanks!
Both Unto the Least of These and Case of Tommy Tucker (2) are available via usenet from user leepete.  Search for just those (without typing Rifftrax) at binsearch.org.
